text: The Laughing Policeman is a 1973 American police thriller movie directed by Stuart Rosenberg and based on the 1968 novel of the same name by Maj Sjöwall and Per Wahlöö. It stars Walter Matthau, Bruce Dern, Louis Gossett Jr., Anthony Zerbe, Albert Paulsen, Joanna Cassidy, Gregory Sierra and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 crime movies Category:1973 thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Stuart Rosenberg
title: The Laughing Policeman (movie)
